story:
Once upon a time in the beautiful land of Iran, there lived a young girl named Layla. Layla had a heart as big as the sky and a smile that could light up even the darkest of nights.

Every evening, Layla's mother would tuck her into bed and tell her stories of faraway lands and magical creatures. Layla's favorite story was about a brave princess who went on daring adventures to save her kingdom.

One night, as Layla lay in bed listening to her mother's soothing voice, she drifted off into a dream world where she was the brave princess herself. She rode on the back of a magnificent unicorn through lush green meadows and sparkling rivers. Together, they faced fearsome dragons and rescued villagers in distress.

As Layla's dream came to an end, she awoke with a smile on her face, feeling brave and strong. Her mother kissed her forehead and whispered, "Remember, my dear Layla, you are just as brave and courageous as the princess in your dreams. You can do anything you set your mind to."

With those words in her heart, Layla drifted off to sleep, feeling safe and loved. And as she slept, she knew that even in her dreams, her mother would be there to guide and protect her.

And so, dear mother, may your daughter always carry the strength and courage of a princess in her heart, and may your bedtime stories fill her dreams with wonder and magic. Goodnight, Layla, sweet dreams. 

The end.
